attributes.action: Give Stephen Sutton A Posthumous Knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
It is not often that a member of our country shows such bravery and courage, but one young man has shown just that. Stephen Sutton has managed to turn his own personal tragedy into triumph, and raised the awareness to such a horrific illness more than many have managed over years in the UK.

This young man allowed the world to share in his final moments and has put the 'FUN' back into fundraising by generating more than £3 Million to help fight this horrific disease.

Let's do what Britain does well and honour such a terrific, brave and inspirational member of Great Britian.
